Notable Research Projects

An Intelligent Underwater Robotic Smart-Sensing System for Water Quality Testing

This project consists of designing an underwater robotic unit that uses a variety of sensors to collect data at different depth of a body of water. The data is then collected and analyzed, and the results are used to understand and predict harmful algal blooms through the use of water quality testing.
